item.description:
The first one went really well! However, several people cancelled a few hours before the game, so this time, please message me to reserve a spot.

This game is for Yankee C- and above level only. Players are required to know how to play a 6-2 and 5-1 formation.

This event is free if you are a member of Boston Community Centers. If not, it's a one-time $20 membership fee that is good for a year (they don't take cash). Those who paid at the Orient Heights Community Center can use their cards at this gym too.

There is street parking by the gym and a parking lot. Once you are on Medford St, take your first right and the lot is on your right side.

It is also 5 minute walk from the Sullivan T stop and Bunker Hill College stop.
item.name: High Intermediate Indoor Volleyball
